fields.value: Replication Data for: Elections Activate Partisanship Across Countries

dsDescriptionValue.value: Replication materials for "Elections Activate Partisanship Across Countries,” by Shane P. Singh and Judd R. Thornton. See "readme.txt" for instructions.

publicationCitation.value: Singh, Shane P., and Judd R. Thornton. 2018. Elections Activate Partisanship Across Countries.” American Political Science Review, 1--6. Published online November 20, 2018.

files.description: Contains data for the reproduction of Figure G.1 in R
files.label: days_until_next_election.tab

dataFile.description: Contains data for the reproduction of Figure G.1 in R

files.description: Gives a description of the data files and the analysis files, as well as step-by-step instructions for the replication of the content of all tables and the figures
files.label: readme.txt

dataFile.description: Gives a description of the data files and the analysis files, as well as step-by-step instructions for the replication of the content of all tables and the figures

files.description: Contains Stata code for reproducing the analyses and figures in the main text and appendix
files.label: singh_thornton_APSR_replication.do

dataFile.description: Contains Stata code for reproducing the analyses and figures in the main text and appendix

files.description: Contains data from Modules 1-3 of the Comparative Study of Electoral Systems, information on GDP per capita from the World Bank’s World Development Indicators, and Polity IV scores from the Center for Systemic Peace
files.label: singh_thornton_APSR_replication.dta

dataFile.description: Contains data from Modules 1-3 of the Comparative Study of Electoral Systems, information on GDP per capita from the World Bank’s World Development Indicators, and Polity IV scores from the Center for Systemic Peace

files.description: Contains R code for reproducing the analyses depicted in the far-right columns of Tables C.1-C.3 in the appendix and Figure G.1
files.label: singh_thornton_APSR_replication.R

dataFile.description: Contains R code for reproducing the analyses depicted in the far-right columns of Tables C.1-C.3 in the appendix and Figure G.1
